Matches Board - Please read|M4d_3w0k|znaverbe@tiu.edu|11/06/00 at 16:24:56|M4d_3w0k|xx|0|192.217.109.14|Welcome to the matches board. &nbsp;The purpose of this board is to provide a place for other clans to challenge plan:b to matches or to set up scrimmages with us.<br><br>Feel free to post your challenge to plan:b in this forum, and not in the general discussion board.<br><br>Nate
